org.relationlearn.model

Interface RelationDigraph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<ArgumentNode>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DigraphImpl

    public interface RelationDigraph
extends Iterable<ArgumentNode>
    The RelationDigraph interface represents a directed weighted graph used to store all arguments in the form of ArgumentNode objects and the relations between those nodes in the form of ArgumentRelation objects.
    See Also:
    ArgumentNode, ArgumentRelation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addArgumentNode(ArgumentNode node)
      Adds a new ArgumentNode to this RelationDigraph.
      boolean containsNode(int nodeId)
      Checks if this RelationDigraph has a node stored with the id equal to nodeId.
      ArgumentNode getArgumentNode(int nodeId)
      Returns the ArgumentNode with id equal to nodeId, this method is expected to return null if there's no such ArgumentNode.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        iterator

    • Method Detail

      • getArgumentNode

        ArgumentNode getArgumentNode(int nodeId)
        Returns the ArgumentNode with id equal to nodeId, this method is expected to return null if there's no such ArgumentNode.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the ArgumentNode to return.
        Returns:
        the ArgumentNode with id nodeId or null if the node can't be found.

      • addArgumentNode

        void addArgumentNode(ArgumentNode node)
                     throws AlreadyExistingNodeException
        Adds a new ArgumentNode to this RelationDigraph.

        Note: Conditions for this method exception throw are implementation dependent and should be specified in their corresponding javadoc page.

        Parameters:
        node - the ArgumentNode to add
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistingNodeException

      • containsNode

        boolean containsNode(int nodeId)
        Checks if this RelationDigraph has a node stored with the id equal to nodeId.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the id of the ArgumentNode to look for existence in the RelationDigraph object.
        Returns:
        true if there's a node with id equal to nodeId, false otherwise.
